connection_error_text: You need to make a connection for Gimi the app to work reliable. Make sure you are connected to Internet and try again.
open_address_book_auth_error_text: Verify that you have given Gimi the app access to your contacts in the settings.
start_slide_2_text:
For tasks, savings and 
the weekly pocket money
start_slide_3_text:
For kids and youngsters to handle
their own money
start_invite_greeting_text: To accept your invitation you need to sign in or create an account by clicking on Join now.
signin_instructions: Enter your number and we send a code
signin_code_invalid_text: We can't find your account. Make sure the information is correct and try again.
signin_code_error_text: Failure with verification of phonenumber / e-mail. Please check your Internetaccess.
signin_token_invalid_text: We couldn't verify the code. Make sure you filled it in correctly.
signin_token_error_text: Something went wrong with the sign in. Check your Internetaccess.
signin_link_invalid_text: The link for signing in is no longer active. Try to sign in again.
signin_link_error_text: Something went wrong with the sign in. Check your Internetaccess and try to open the same link again.
dashboard_parent_instructions: Add a child or open the link in an invitation to get started.
has_invite_instructions: If you have received an invitation from your child or another parent just open and press the link in the message to accept the invitation.
child_editor_start_age_microcopy: The age is used in the next step to suggest weekly or monthly allowance.
child_editor_money_amount_insctructions_:
Talk to your child about what the
money should be enough to buy. Keep in mind that
you later on can add tasks with
rewards.

Talk to your child about what the
money should be enough to buy. Keep in mind that
you later on can add tasks with
rewards.
child_editor_money_instructions_weekly:
Decide whether your child should 
have weekly or monthly allowance. 
For children under 11 years old 
is weekly allowance most common.
child_editor_money_instructions_monthly:
Decide whether your child should 
have weekly or monthly allowance. 
For children over 11 years old 
is monthly allowance most common.
child_editor_money_instructions_suggesti:
Most %1$d year olds have a 
%2$c of %3$s.
child_editor_money_amount_warning_text:
Eftersom du sänker %1$ss %2$s med mer än %3$s så blir saldot för %2$sen negativt.

Du kan göra en insättning i spargrisen och sedan föra över pengar till %2$sen eller höja summan igen för att återställa kontosaldot.
child_editor_money_reminder_weekly:
We remind you when it's time to give 
out the weekly allowance.
child_editor_money_reminder_monthly:
We remind you when it's time to give 
out the monthly allowance.
child_editor_interest_instructions:
Your child can 
save some of their %1$s in the piggy bank.
Do you want to encourage your child to save money put
 an interest rate that makes the money in 
the Piggy bank increase some every %2$s.
child_editor_interest_example:
With %1$c in the piggy bank does 
the saving increase with <boldGreen>%2$c</boldGreen> at a %3$s.
child_editor_data_tracking_instructions: Put a limit for %1$ds mobile surf. Then you can easily follow how much of your weekly MB surf that has been used.
child_editor_data_tracking_set: Put a maximum limit for every %1$s
child_editor_data_tracking_suggestion: Most %1$d-year olds has today got a maximum limit at %2$d for every %3$s.
signup_parent_instructions:
Create your account 
and get closer to your childs 
economy.
signup_parent_disclaimer: P.S. We are locking up your personal information in our vault
signup_child_instructions: And start saving money towards millions.
signup_child_start_email: E-mail (you don't need to create one)
signup_child_disclaimer: P.S. We are locking up your personal information in our vault
signup_child_negotiation_instructions: It's time to negotiate about the weekly pocket money!
signup_child_invite_instructions: It's time to invite a parent that will give you your weekly- or monthly pocket money.
signup_child_invite_error_text: We couldn't send out your invite. Check out your connection and try again.
add_task_recurring_day_pick: You can choose several days of the week
add_task_notify_when_recurring_period_is: Notify when the time is out
add_task_data_tracking_description_month: Don't surf more than %1$mb until next mothly pocket money
profile_onboarding_parent: This is where you can see %1$ds profile with the next %2$s and if %1$d has chosen to postpone %2$s and saved them in the piggy bank. Click at the icons for more information!
profile_onboarding_child: Here you can see how much you're going to get as your %1$s and when you are going to get them. You can choose to save some of your %1$s in your piggy bank and then ask to cash out your money later. Click at the icons for more information!
profile_goals_empty: Time to start saving for something?
profile_goals_popover_not_reached: The savings goal %1$c is not accomplished yet.
profile_available_tasks_empty_parent: It would be nice with a new task!
profile_countdown_congrats:
Congratulations you have now 
joined Gimi!
profile_countdown_challenge_parents:
Your parents have now 24 hours left 
to respond to your request.
profile_invite_instructions: Ask your parent to make a registration so that you two can start using Gimi togheter!
goal_editor_title_input_hint: What item/experience are you saving for?
task_requires_photo_text: Take a picture that proofs that you have done the task!
task_completed_text_child: You are now done with a task. Where do you wanna put your <boldGreen>%1$c</boldGreen>?
task_completed_text_parent: Where does %1$d want to put his reward at <boldGreen>%2$c</boldGreen> ?
task_reject_text: Do you want to mark your task as "not approved"? This will take back the already given reward %1$s.
allowance_popover_text_empty: Today is %1$d going to get %2$c %3$s. Because it is %4$s has %1$s already got it or choosed to save it in the piggy bank. Bravo!
payout_has_not_paid: No, it has not been payed out yet
mark_allowance_as_paid_instructions: You can specify a smaller amount if you haven't already cashed out the whole amount.
transfer_to_allowance_child_instructions: Du kan som mest överföra %1$s av summan i spargrisen till din %2$s
savings_popover_text: %1$d har sparat <boldGreen>%2$c</boldGreen>. Det ger en sparbonus på <boldGreen>%3$c</boldGreen> som läggs i spargrisen %4$d.
savings_popover_text_today: %1$s har sparat %3$s. Idag fick %2$s en sparbonus på %4$s för det %2$s sparat under den senaste %5$s.
savings_popover_text_none: %1$d har inte sparat några pengar än.
transfer_to_savings_child_instructions: Du kan som mest överföra %1$s av din %2$s till spargrisen
transfer_server_error_text: Överföringen kunde inte genomföras på grund av ett oväntat fel. Kontrollera din anslutning och försök igen.
child_settings_nav_share_text: Jag vill tipsa dig om en app för att lära barn och ungdomar att hantera pengar! Kolla in den på http://veckopengen.se
child_settings_invite_child_instructions: Bjud in %1$d så att ni kan hålla koll på %2$sen tillsammans.
child_settings_invite_parent_instruction: Bjud in genom telefonnummer eller e-post.
invite_error_text: Kan inte aktivera inbjudan. Du behöver få en ny inbjudan skickad till dig.
countdown_popover_action_remove: Ta bort konto och börja om
account_remove_confirm_text: Om du fortsätter kommer ditt konto och all tillhörande data att raderas. Detta går inte att ångra!
notifications_promo_text: Aktivera pushnotiser för att få reda på viktiga händelser i applikationen
notifications_promo_push_text_parent: Ditt barn har utfört uppgiften klipp gräsmattan
notifications_promo_push_text_child: Du har fått en sparbonus på 10kr i spargrisen!
push_connected_with_parent: Tjoho! Du har nu blivit ihopkopplad med en förälder!
push_weekly_intrest_added: Grattis! Veckans sparbonus har lagts i spargrisen
push_monthly_intrest_added: Grattis! Månadens sparbonus har lagts i spargrisen
push_payment_weekly_payment_reminder_chi: Idag ska du få din veckopeng
push_payment_monthly_payment_reminder_ch: Idag ska du få din månadspeng
push_update_recurring_new_task: Spana in! Du har fått en ny uppgift!
push_update_recurring_new_tasks: Kolla! Du har fått nya uppgifter!
push_new_allowance_added: Hurra! Nu har veckopengen fyllts på igen!
push_new_assignment: Yihaa! Du har fått en ny uppgift!
push_assignment_active_again: Uppgiften "%s" är tillgänglig igen. Först till kvarn!
push_assignment_done_by_other: Nu var du inte snabb nog! %s utförde "%s" innan dig.
push_assignment_not_approved: Uppgiften "%s" blev tyvärr inte godkänd. Försök igen!
push_insertion_by_other: Najs! %s satte precis in %d kr i din spargris
dashboard_insertion_by_other: %s har satt in %d kr i Spargrisen
push_full_allowance_paid_out_by_parent: %s markerade precis att du fått din %s
push_partial_allowance_paid_out_by_paren: %s markerade precis att du fått %d kr av din %s
notifications_task_done_text: %s blev godkänd och du har inkasserat %d%s!
overview_child_item_setup_text: Najs! Du är snart klar, tryck här!
expense_popover_description_child: Hur mycket pengar har du fått?
notification_payment_sent_text: {name} fick {amount} {currency} i spargrisen {datetime}. Har du betalat ut den kontant?
notification_payment_sent_leave_in_pig_b: Nej, låt den lägga kvar i spargrisen
